attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: alter the personal tax allowances so that the poorest in society do not find themselves worse off with the abandoment of the 10% tax rate as proposed from april 2008.Without the usual excuse of no final decision has been made, or that working tax credit will increase, as this does not cover everyone.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
